queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:se_settings` ( `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `company_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default 'en', `value` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`name`, `company_id`, `lang_code`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=UTF8

CREATE TABLE `?:se_queue` ( `queue_id` mediumint NOT NULL auto_increment, `data` text NOT NULL, `action` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `company_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default 'en', `started` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `error_count` int NOT NULL default 0, `status` enum('pending', 'processing') default 'pending', PRIMARY KEY (`queue_id`), KEY (`status`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=UTF8
